'''!LinuxFest''' is a dream to have a community conference and celebration that is accessible to everyone.

Here is a list of LinuxFests in North America, in order of happening...

1. <nowiki>[[http://www.newmexicognulinuxfest.org/|New Mexico LinuxFest]]</nowiki> December, 19th 2009
2. <nowiki>[[http://www.socallinuxexpo.org|Southern California Linux Expo]]</nowiki>  February 19-21, 2010
3. <nowiki>[[http://www.cossfest.ca|Calgary Open Source Software Fest]]</nowiki> April 9 & 10 2010
4. <nowiki>[[http://www.texaslinuxfest.org/|Texas LinuxFest]]</nowiki> April 10, 2010
5. <nowiki>[[http://linuxfestnorthwest.org/|North West LinuxFest]]</nowiki> April 24 & 25, 2010
6. <nowiki>[[http://www.southeastlinuxfest.org/|South East LinuxFest]]</nowiki> Summer 2010
7. <nowiki>[[OhioLinuxFest]]</nowiki> September 10-12 2010
8. <nowiki>[[http://atlantalinuxfest.org/|Atlanta LinuxFest]]</nowiki> Fall 2010
9. <nowiki>[[http://2009.utosc.com/pages/home/|Utah Open Source Conference]]</nowiki> Fall 2010
10. <nowiki>[[http://fsoss.ca|Toronto LinuxFest]]</nowiki> (part of FSOSS) October 2011
11. <nowiki>[[http://www.floridalinuxshow.com|Floria Linux Show - Orlando]]</nowiki> Fall 2010
